data.bannerMobileDescription: To provide the best possible user experience, roadsurfer uses various services that use Cookies and similar technologies. Some services are necessary for the website to function and do not require your consent. Others are used to analyze and improve your user experience and are used by us and external partners to show you relevant advertising content.
data.bannerMessage: To provide the best possible user experience, roadsurfer uses various services that employ cookies and similar technologies. Some are technically necessary for the website to function and do not require your consent. Others are used to analyze and improve your user experience or to show you relevant content and advertising in collaboration with external partners. By clicking " Accept cookies ," you agree to the use of all services that require your consent. You can revoke your consent at any time via "Settings" with effect for the future or make individual selections there.

categories.label: Essential
categories.description: These technologies are required to activate the core functionality of the website.

categories.label: Marketing
categories.description: These technologies are used by advertisers to serve ads that are relevant to your interests.

categories.label: Significant
categories.description: These technologies enable us to analyse the use of the website in order to measure and improve performance.

ccpa.firstLayerDescription: We and our partners are using technologies like cookies and process personal data in order to improve your experience. In case of sale of your personal information you may exercise your consumer right to opt-out by activating the toggle 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information' below. tcf2.firstLayerDescription: We and our third-party vendors use technologies (e.g. cookies) to store and/or access information on user's devices in order to process personal data such as IP addresses or browsing data. You may consent to the processing of your personal data for the listed purposes below. Alternatively you can set your preferences before consenting or refuse to consent. Please note that some vendors may process your personal data based on their legitimate business interest and do not ask for your consent. To exercise your right to object to processing based on legitimate interest please view our vendorlist.
tcf2.secondLayerDescription: You can access more detailed information below regarding all purposes and third-party vendors implemented on this website. You can adjust your privacy settings based on specific purposes and/or at a vendor level at any time.
tcf2.labelsIabVendors: Vendors who are part of the IAB TCF
tcf2.labelsDisclaimer: All choices on this website will be applied globally, which means they will be available on other websites that set your choices globally. By clicking on our Privacy Button in the bottom left corner, you can change your settings or withdraw your consent at any time.
tcf2.appLayerNoteResurface: You can change your privacy settings or withdraw your consent at any time by opening the menu point Privacy Settings.
tcf2.firstLayerNoteGlobal: Your choices for this website will be applied globally, which means they will be available to other websites that set your choices globally.
tcf2.firstLayerNoteResurface: You can change your privacy settings or withdraw your consent at any time by clicking on our Privacy Button.
tcf2.firstLayerNoteService: Your choices for this website will be applied on this page only. You can change your Privacy Settings or withdraw your consent at any time by clicking on our Privacy Button.
tcf2.labelsNonIabVendors: Vendors who are not part of the IAB TCF
tcf2.dataSharedOutsideEUText: Some vendors might transfer data to countries outside the EU / EEA (third country data transfer), such as the USA, as part of the processing for the mentioned purposes. The level of data protection in these countries might not be comparable to the data protection regime in EU / EEA countries; there is therefore a particular risk that government authorities could access this data. For more information on security guarantees, see the vendors privacy policy or contact the vendor directly.
tcf2.atpAdditionalInfo: Click here to read the privacy policy of the data processor

labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_DESCRIPTION:
We and our advertising partners process your personal data using technologies in order to serve advertising, analyse our traffic and deliver customised experiences for you. You have a choice in who uses your data and for what purposes.

Some partners do not ask for your consent to process your data, instead, they rely on their legitimate interest. View our list of partners to see the purposes they believe they have legitimate interest for and how you can object to it.

Find out more about how your personal data is processed and set your preferences below.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_FEATURES_DESCRIP: View the required features enabled for the processing of personal data and opt-in separately for any special features.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PARTNERS_ATP_DES: Some of our partners work with us through Google. Expand each one below to see their privacy policies and how they process your data.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PARTNERS_DESCRIP: See the partners we work with. Expand each one to see how they process your data. You can object to legitimate interest processing per vendor.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PURPOSES_DESCRIP: You can set your consent preferences and determine how you want your data to be used based on the purposes below. Each purpose has a description so that you know how we and our partners use your data. You can object to legitimate interest processing per purpose.
labels.WEB_TCF_CONSENT_TAB_DESCRIPTON:
We and our %VENDOR_COUNT% advertising partners process your personal data using technologies in order to serve advertising, analyse our traffic and deliver customised experiences for you. You have a choice in who uses your data and for what purposes.

Some partners do not ask for your consent to process your data, instead, they rely on their legitimate interest. View our list of partners to see the purposes they believe they have legitimate interest for and how you can object to it.

The Consent Signal (TC String) is stored in the Local Storage with a maximum retention period of 13 months, after which a renewed consent decision is required. Find out more about how your personal data is processed and set your preferences below.
labels.WEB_TCF_MAX_STORAGE_DURATION_TEXT: The choices you make regarding the purposes and entities listed are saved in the local storage in '%TC_STRING_LOCATION%’, for a maximum of 13 months. After up to 13 months, the CMP will prompt again.

labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_DESCRIPTION:
We and our advertising partners process your personal data using technologies in order to serve advertising, analyse our traffic and deliver customised experiences for you. You have a choice in who uses your data and for what purposes.

Some partners do not ask for your consent to process your data, instead, they rely on their legitimate interest. View our list of partners to see the purposes they believe they have legitimate interest for and how you can object to it.

Find out more about how your personal data is processed and set your preferences below.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_FEATURES_DESCRIP: View the required features enabled for the processing of personal data and opt-in separately for any special features.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PARTNERS_ATP_DES: Some of our partners work with us through Google. Expand each one below to see their privacy policies and how they process your data.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PARTNERS_DESCRIP: See the partners we work with. Expand each one to see how they process your data. You can object to legitimate interest processing per vendor.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PURPOSES_DESCRIP: You can set your consent preferences and determine how you want your data to be used based on the purposes below. Each purpose has a description so that you know how we and our partners use your data. You can object to legitimate interest processing per purpose.
labels.WEB_TCF_CONSENT_TAB_DESCRIPTON:
We and our %VENDOR_COUNT% advertising partners process your personal data using technologies in order to serve advertising, analyse our traffic and deliver customised experiences for you. You have a choice in who uses your data and for what purposes.

Some partners do not ask for your consent to process your data, instead, they rely on their legitimate interest. View our list of partners to see the purposes they believe they have legitimate interest for and how you can object to it.

The Consent Signal (TC String) is stored in the Local Storage with a maximum retention period of 13 months, after which a renewed consent decision is required. Find out more about how your personal data is processed and set your preferences below.
labels.WEB_TCF_MAX_STORAGE_DURATION_TEXT: The choices you make regarding the purposes and entities listed are saved in the local storage in '%TC_STRING_LOCATION%’, for a maximum of 13 months. After up to 13 months, the CMP will prompt again.

Some are technically necessary for the website to function and do not require your consent. labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_DESCRIPTION:
We and our advertising partners process your personal data using technologies in order to serve advertising, analyse our traffic and deliver customised experiences for you. You have a choice in who uses your data and for what purposes.

Some partners do not ask for your consent to process your data, instead, they rely on their legitimate interest. View our list of partners to see the purposes they believe they have legitimate interest for and how you can object to it.

Find out more about how your personal data is processed and set your preferences below.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_FEATURES_DESCRIP: View the required features enabled for the processing of personal data and opt-in separately for any special features.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PARTNERS_ATP_DES: Some of our partners work with us through Google. Expand each one below to see their privacy policies and how they process your data.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PARTNERS_DESCRIP: See the partners we work with. Expand each one to see how they process your data. You can object to legitimate interest processing per vendor.
labels.WEB_TCF_AD_SETTINGS_TAB_PURPOSES_DESCRIP: You can set your consent preferences and determine how you want your data to be used based on the purposes below. Each purpose has a description so that you know how we and our partners use your data. You can object to legitimate interest processing per purpose.
labels.WEB_TCF_CONSENT_TAB_DESCRIPTON:
We and our %VENDOR_COUNT% advertising partners process your personal data using technologies in order to serve advertising, analyse our traffic and deliver customised experiences for you. You have a choice in who uses your data and for what purposes.

Some partners do not ask for your consent to process your data, instead, they rely on their legitimate interest. View our list of partners to see the purposes they believe they have legitimate interest for and how you can object to it.

The Consent Signal (TC String) is stored in the Local Storage with a maximum retention period of 13 months, after which a renewed consent decision is required. Find out more about how your personal data is processed and set your preferences below.
labels.WEB_TCF_MAX_STORAGE_DURATION_TEXT: The choices you make regarding the purposes and entities listed are saved in the local storage in '%TC_STRING_LOCATION%’, for a maximum of 13 months. After up to 13 months, the CMP will prompt again.
